Package com.gsm.controller.api

Class ZaloApiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.controller.api.ZaloApiController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/zalo")
public class ZaloApiController
extends java.lang.Object
    A REST controller that handles all API requests originating from the Zalo Mini App.

    • Method Detail

      • loginByZaloId

        @PostMapping("/login")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDto> loginByZaloId​(@RequestBody
                                                                      ZaloLoginRequestDto loginRequest)
        API endpoint for logging in a user via their Zalo ID.
        Parameters:
        loginRequest - DTO containing the Zalo User ID.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity with the authenticated UserDto.

      • linkAccount

        @PostMapping("/link-account")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDto> linkAccount​(@RequestBody
                                                                    ZaloLinkRequestDto linkRequest)
        API endpoint for linking a Zalo account to a system (GSM) user account.
        Parameters:
        linkRequest - DTO with Zalo ID, system username, and password.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity with the linked UserDto.

      • getStylesAndColorsForSaleOrder

        @GetMapping("/sale-orders/{saleOrderNo}/styles")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ZaloSaleOrderInfoDto> getStylesAndColorsForSaleOrder​(@PathVariable
                                                                                                    java.lang.String saleOrderNo)
        API endpoint to get the distinct styles and colors for a given Sale Order. Used to populate dropdowns in the Zalo Mini App.
        Parameters:
        saleOrderNo - The Sale Order number.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity with a DTO containing the sale order ID and a list of styles/colors.

      • saveProductionOutputs

        @PostMapping("/output")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> saveProductionOutputs​(@RequestBody
                                                                                     java.util.List<ProductionOutputDto> outputDtos)
        API endpoint to save a batch of production output records from the Zalo Mini App.
        Parameters:
        outputDtos - A list of production output data.
        Returns:
        An empty ResponseEntity with a 200 OK status.
